svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Health expenditure and financing, per capita
Per capita health expenditure and financing measured in 2010 international-$ for OECD countries. Health expenditure
is inclusive of all financing schemes, and covers all aspects of healthcare.
